title: Project generator for amazon S3 extension is incorrect

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Describe the bug

When using the Quarkus project configurer and selecting amazon S3 extension, the generated pom.xml is incorrect.

On the dependency management, both groupId and version are incorrect, refering to quarkus platform group id and version:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79290619/171068882-c31978fe-9555-4fa7-9ba4-4c2cd2e97bf8.png)


### Expected behavior

Expecting to be something like this instead:

```
<dependency>
          <groupId>io.quarkiverse.amazonservices</groupId>
          <artifactId>quarkus-amazon-services-bom</artifactId>
          <version>1.1.1</version>
          <type>pom</type>
          <scope>import</scope>
</dependency>
```

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

Just using the quarkus project configurer

https://code.quarkus.io/?e=io.quarkiverse.amazonservices%3Aquarkus-amazon-s3&extension-search=origin:platform%20amazon

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_
